text.en: A glass of water solves half.
Ten minutes today is a win.
Even good people get a no.

subtext.en: Don’t get pulled by others’ urgency.
Cut it now to feel free.

text.en: If it’s vague, it’s a no.

text.ko: 지금 안 하면 내일도 안 해.

text.en: If both are meh, find option C.
You don't have to fix everything.
See it from their side once more.
Click now or lose the chance.
World spins without you doing it.

text.ko: A vs B 고민? 동전 던져.
text.en: A vs B? Flip a coin.

subtext.en: Don't lose it to others' urgency.

text.ko: 선택 후회 말고 선택 후 최선.
